segments.text: I notice the water from the sink is really overflowing, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried that someone might slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems to be completely unaware of the mess, too focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being quite clever, sneaking cookies while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, climbing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire his bravery, but I also think it's quite dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be enjoying the thrill of getting caught, eagerly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they'll do if the woman suddenly turns around and catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into too much trouble, but I also hope they don't hurt themselves trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disgusting to see the water just overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
